column5: Picked up "The Total Fishing Manual" by Field & Stream at my local Walmart in their discounted book table  with the regular listed price of $29.99 & discounted 40% off so sale price was around $18.00. Lots of good  hints/thoughts (317) on tools-techniques-tactics-lures-bait etc. A good book for someone just starting to  learn how to fish as well as for a fisherperson who has several years of experience.
